name: Skydive Forever
description:
Skydive Forever is an arcade-like game where the player dodges through endless and ever speeding crates to reach higher scores. Controls KeyActionA or Dpad-LeftMove to the leftD or Dpad-RightMove to the rightW or Dpad-DownDiveSpacebarStart game

(You can enable touch screen controls under "Settings" in the main menu)

Some Context

I made this game in under two days whilst trying to learn a new game engine: godot.  Although I have developed games for other platforms and game mods, this is the first compiled game I have published. I look forward to improve and make better games so, if you have any feedback, please tell me it! It is appreciated.
